 background-color: #f4faf2 !important;  background-image : url(https://si74.ru/wp-content/themes/jarida/images/patterns/body-bg1.png);background-position: top center;

body{

	font-family: 'Open Sans';

	font-family: 'Open Sans';

	font-family: 'Open Sans';
	font-weight: normal !important;
}

	font-family: 'Open Sans';

.post-title{

	font-family: 'Open Sans';
	font-weight: normal !important;
}

	font-family: 'Open Sans';
	font-weight: normal !important;
}

	font-family: 'Open Sans';

}
